page.title: 08HOMELIFE OF A TEACHER
page.content: Mrs. Huskisson who is a teacher, lives with her husband and daughter, in Shelfield. Her twin sons are at Warwick University. Mrs. Huskisson owns one car. She and her husband get up at 6.45am and her daughter gets up at 7.00am. She has her breakfast at 7.15am with the rest of the family. She leaves for school at 8.40am and has her lunch at home at about 12.30pm. Her favourite subject at school is English. She usually leaves school at about 4.40pm, and has dinner at 6.30pm. Mrs. Huskisson's hobbies are dressmaking and music. She is taking a German course at Park Hall School. She uses her spare time to read or to do the housework. She goes to bed at 11.45pm.
